cbe4f867a4eaf7ec375508a9901ea7517b9854c9a542c242050beda5127","dweb:/ipfs/QmS499VRDhAgMg1pK96PiyRpP3gJZzzMcoNBbe8AV3JNw3"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/Initializable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xae7044b7c89ed74327b0979ae6f317c65d87b8d17a42d0c62d698d77d5de5511","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d676c978d8ecee5c4510f045b747d94f3a1381e39feb870d2675d5b6d45a371b","dweb:/ipfs/QmUAokuHWPVAf14QkhPtSdYFyNa8HVje9CBEzwCcxH3xkP"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/token/ERC20/ERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e71cf53c2ee5c9e4f183e168028fc208560493aaf48668bca0981bb2c8359c2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7cb9d29f7bc76b077649ccef2043e1492a462afcb2410f443e63233f206a95dd","dweb:/ipfs/QmRDXEro4hh2E6rTUAWvBkHzivAS1TBmtSLP1mRGAHVnnL"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/token/ERC20/IERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa1931c47a617014f858580db625aa0dcf343796f39acd4b5b51effc092a1f0a9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2cbeb499bad52667b96dd7df8e9b1f583e8c07afaba0018a75e5b7ff6e777173","dweb:/ipfs/QmPLJnuhEcWnpmhMHKsiuVHVxMwb5k6idYyjajbrtZLz5B"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/token/ERC20/SafeERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8457e15aa90badabe0d6ef6f572f1ebd47bebf156921c825ae6e009dda15b706","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ffc78495829b68080e73582789526fd67b80fb0df341954fc51eb9a318cb8f79","dweb:/ipfs/QmdNEUEYMMxHsYYNqZdkP79vzH63X6f8qmGR8JV4q4zJ45"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/utils/AddressUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfc5ea91fa9ceb1961023b2a6c978b902888c52b90847ac7813fe3b79524165f6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a6b81dcc816857a9d981386f6d8de49198420ee41cdc0ecade366ab412174d03","dweb:/ipfs/QmV2vznMT6m9qo3pFMAWi3Nz3UDhwesgwFxeXe6Tod3v8A"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
Add a lock to each address so that it could not perform deposit, withdraw, or transfer in the same block.
 Borrows ideas from Badger Sett.
 https://github.com/Badger-Finance/badger-system/blob/master/contracts/badger-sett/Sett.sol

@dev Checks whether the current block is locked for this address.
 A block is locked for an address if it performs deposit, withdraw or transfer in this block.
@dev Returns the total balance in both vault and strategy.
@dev Updates the emergency mode. Only governance or strategist can update emergency mode.

@dev Starts earning and deposits all current balance into strategy.
 Only strategist or governance can call this function.

@dev Harvest yield from the strategy if set.
 Only strategist or governance can call this function.
@dev Deposit some balance to the vault.
@dev Withdraws some balance out of the vault.
@dev Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.
@dev Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.
@dev Used to salvage any ETH deposited into the vault by mistake.

@dev Used to salvage any token deposited into the vault by mistake.
 @param _tokenAddress Token address to salvage.
@dev Returns the number of vault token per share is worth.

Add a lock to each address so that it could not perform deposit, withdraw, or transfer in the same block.
 Borrows ideas from Badger Sett.
 https://github.com/Badger-Finance/badger-system/blob/master/contracts/badger-sett/Sett.sol

@dev Checks whether the current block is locked for this address.
 A block is locked for an address if it performs deposit, withdraw or transfer in this block.
@dev Returns the total balance in both vault and strategy.
@dev Updates the emergency mode. Only governance or strategist can update emergency mode.

@dev Starts earning and deposits all current balance into strategy.
 Only strategist or governance can call this function.

@dev Harvest yield from the strategy if set.
 Only strategist or governance can call this function.
@dev Deposit some balance to the vault.
@dev Withdraws some balance out of the vault.
@dev Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.
@dev Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.
@dev Used to salvage any ETH deposited into the vault by mistake.

@dev Used to salvage any token deposited into the vault by mistake.
 @param _tokenAddress Token address to salvage.
@dev Returns the number of vault token per share is worth.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

balance().details: Returns the total balance in both vault and strategy.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless {_setupDecimals} is called. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

deposit(uint256).details: Deposit some balance to the vault.

earn().details: Starts earning and deposits all current balance into strategy. Only strategist or governance can call this function.

getPricePerFullShare().details: Returns the number of vault token per share is worth.

governance().details: Returns the governance of the vault. Note that Controller and all vaults share the same governance, so this is a shortcut to return Controller.governance().

harvest().details: Harvest yield from the strategy if set. Only strategist or governance can call this function.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

initialize(address,address,string,string.details: Initializes the Vault contract. Can be called only once.

params._controller: The Controller contract that manages the vaults.
params._nameOverride: Provides a custom vault token name. Use default if empty.
params._symbolOverride: Provides a custom vault token symbol. Use default if empty.
params._want: The token that the vault pools to seak return.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256).details: Notifies the vault that a new reward is added.

params._rewardAmount: Amount of reward that is newly added to the vault.

salvage().details: Used to salvage any ETH deposited into the vault by mistake.

salvageToken(address).details: Used to salvage any token deposited into the vault by mistake.

setActiveStrategy(address).details: Updates the active strategy of the vault. Only strategist can update the active strategy. Only approved strategy can be selected as active strategy. No new strategy is accepted in emergency mode.

setEmergencyMode(bool).details: Updates the emergency mode. Only governance or strategist can update emergency mode.

setStrategist(address).details: Updates the strategist address. Only governance can update strategist. Each vault has its own strategist to perform daily permissioned opertions. Vault and its strategies managed share the same strategist.

setStrategy(address,bool).details: Approves or revokes strategy. Only governance can approve or revoke strategies. Note that this does not affect the current active strategy and it takes effect only on the next time an active strategy is selected.

params._approved: If true, the strategy can be selected as active strategy.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Add lock to transfer so that it can not happen in the same block as deposit and withdraw.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws some balance out of the vault.

activeStrategy.details: Returns the current active strategy of the vault. Only strategist can select active strategy for the vault. At most strategy is active at a time.

approvedStrategies.details: Checks whether a strategy is approved on the vault. Only governance can approve and revoke strategies.
approvedStrategies.return: Whether the strategy is approved on the vault.

emergencyMode.details: Whether the vault is now in emergency mode. When the vault is in emergency mode: 1. No deposit is allowed (but withdraw is allowed); 2. No new active strategy can be set.

strategist.details: Returns the strategist of the vault. Each vault has its own strategist to perform daily permissioned opertions. Vault and its strategies managed share the same strategist.

want.details: Returns the token that the vault pools.

lockBlocks(address).notice: Add a lock to each address so that it could not perform deposit, withdraw, or transfer in the same block. Borrows ideas from Badger Sett. https://github.com/Badger-Finance/badger-system/blob/master/contracts/badger-sett/Sett.sol

userdoc.notice: Yearn style vault which earns yield for a specific token. Vaults are capital pools of one single token which seaks yield from the market. A vault manages multiple strategies and at most one strategy is active at a time.
